text: Feature request:  HubDB Row picker field - I have a site that has numerous HubDBs being used, and currently in order to display certain data on pages the user has to enter into a text field the row id. This isn’t a big deal but it means they have to have the HubDB pulled up at the same time as editing the page.

Cheers! From what we can tell we do have this fixed in the new template renderer for drag and drop email templates but we'll run a couple more checks. This renderer will eventually replace the one we have currently in the classic templates built in Design Manager
I’m very excited for when you guys make it possible for us to build templates for that editor
